TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNamespaceResolver

summary.span: 描述一个服务，该服务可按照 XAML 标记中映射的方式基于 XAML 命名空间的前缀返回该命名空间。

span.span: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XAML 对象编写器调用值转换行为时，类型转换器和标记扩展可以在 XAML 对象编写器提供的服务上下文上查询 作为服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[可用于类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions)[的 XAML 的类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 此接口还作为 类中 WPF XAML 实现的一部分实现。This interface is also implemented as part of the WPF XAML implementation in the class. 存储 XAML 命名空间信息，并与 XAML 处理器进行交互，以便通过相同的 接口将该信息转发到服务上下文。 stores XAML namespace information and interacts with XAML processors to forward that information to the service context through the same interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetNamespace(string prefix) cil managed
Public Function GetNamespace (prefix As String) As String

param.name: prefix
param.span: 要针对其检索 XAML 命名空间信息的前缀。

span.span: The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.

summary.span: 针对指定的前缀字符串检索 XAML 命名空间标识符。

span.span: Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.

returns.span: 所请求 XAML 命名空间标识符，表示为字符串形式。

span.span: The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration> GetNamespacePrefixes() cil managed
Public Function GetNamespacePrefixes () As IEnumerable(Of NamespaceDeclaration)

summary.span: 返回所有可能的前缀到 XAML 命名空间映射（ 值），这些映射可在活动架构上下文中找到。

span.span: Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings ( values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.

returns.span: 若要获取所有前缀字符串，请从返回的集内的每个值中获取 值。

span.span: To get all the prefix strings, get the value from each value in the returned set.

returns.span: 要获取特定 XAML 命名空间的前缀，请处理任何具有所需 值的返回值。

span.span: To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired value.
